member.name: T:IshanTools.StyleTheme
member.summary: Specifies identifiers to indicate the available 'IshanStylers' style themes.

member.name: F:IshanTools.StyleTheme.Steel
member.summary: The 'IshanStylers' style theme is Blue (Default).

member.name: F:IshanTools.StyleTheme.Rose
member.summary: The 'IshanStylers' style theme is Rose.

member.name: F:IshanTools.StyleTheme.Jade
member.summary: The 'IshanStylers' style theme is Jade.

member.name: T:IshanTools.IshanStylers

member.name: M:IshanTools.IshanStylers.SetupStylers(IshanTools.StyleTheme)
member.summary: Resets the 'IshanStylers' environment and prepares the styler fonts, colors and objects. This function is required in order to provide custom style keywords. The style theme to apply. Optional: default is Steel.

member.name: M:IshanTools.IshanStylers.RunStylers(System.Windows.Forms.Form,IshanTools.StyleTheme)
member.summary: Applies an 'IshanStylers' style theme to the specified Windows Form.
member.param: The style theme to apply. Optional.

member.name: M:IshanTools.IshanStylers.SetToolTip(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.String)
member.summary: Applies a ToolTip to the specified control.
member.param: The control to add the ToolTip to.
The text to be displayed when the ToolTip is visible.

member.name: M:IshanTools.IshanStylers.SetTextBoxValid(System.Windows.Forms.TextBox,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Applies the Valid or Invalid style to the specified TextBox control.
member.param: The TextBox control to be styled.
Determines if the TextBox should be styled with Valid or Invalid style.
